name: Furry Armpits
description:
The gameFurry Armpits is a puzzle game with 3 unique puzzle formulas that switch up every 5 levels, so be ready for a challenge, as with every level the game gets a bit harder!Features
- Enjoy 15 unique levels with 3 different puzzle modes for you to complete.
- Play 3 specials levels with special artwork.
- Visit the Gallery, revealing our hot girls artwork for each level you completed.
- Toggle the girls clothing in the gallery.
